Version:§7v5 (Fri, 11 Mar 2005 17:30:45 GMT)§r
Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o42 pages, 11 figures. Extensively revised version on June 14, 2004. Revised Appendix B and a few changes on July, 2004. Slight revision on March 10, 2005\u00a7r

§n§2math.MG§r, §2math.GR§r, §2math.NT§r§r
§6§lApollonian Circle Packings: Geometry and Group Theory II. Super-Apollonian Group and Integral Packings§r

§8§oR. L. Graham
J. C. Lagarias
C. L. Mallows
A. R. Wilks§r

§72005§r

arXiv:§c§nmath/0010302§r

Journal reference:§1§nDiscrete and Computational Geometry, 35: 1-36(2006)§r

Version:§7v5 (Fri, 11 Mar 2005 17:34:27 GMT)§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o37 Pages, 11 figures. The second in a series on Apollonian circle packings beginning with math.MG/0010298. Extensively revised in June, 2004. More integral properties arediscussed. More revision in July, 2004:
interchange sections 7 and 8, revised sections 1 and 2 to match, and added matrix formulations for super-Apollonian group and its Lorentz version. Slight revision in March 10, 2005\u00a7r

Version:§7v4 (Fri, 11 Mar 2005 17:36:53 GMT)§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7o37 pages. The third in a series on Apollonian circle packings beginning with math.MG/0010298. Revised and extended. Added: Apollonian groups and Apollonian Cluster Ensembles (Section 4),and Presentation for
n-dimensional Apollonian Group (Section 5). Slight revision on March 10, 2005\u00a7r
